---
output:
  bookdown::pdf_document2:
    includes:
      in_header: preamble.tex
      before_body: title.tex
    toc: FALSE
    highlight: tango
    number_sections: TRUE
    df_print: tibble
    latex_engine: pdflatex
bibliography: [paper.bib, packages.bib]
biblio-style: apalike
urlcolor: blue
linkcolor: blue
links-as-notes: true
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, fig.align = "center",
  out.width = "100%", dpi = 300, fig.asp = 0.618, collapse = TRUE
)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
# creates bibliography file for R packages
knitr::write_bib(
  c(
    "dplyr", "ggplot2", "forcats", "lubridate", "rlang", "scales", "scoringutils",
    "stats", "stringr", "tidyr", "tidyselect", "here", "kableExtra", "knitr", "readr",
    "rmarkdown", "testthat"
  ),
  file = here::here("term_paper", "packages.bib")
)
```
